page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle left property
page.description: The distance in pixels from the left side of the screen to the left edge of the clipping rectangle.

discussion.p: Defines the distance between the left side of the clipping rectangle and the screen. For example, if a value of 50 is specified for the *[ui:left]* property, the left edge of the clipping rectangle with be 50 pixels from the left side of the screen.
